L2_gloss: belly, stomach, abdomen, shibid (“my belly”), bibid
belly, stomach, abdomen, shibig ― my belly, bibig ―
(of boxes in the back of a vehicle) to rattle
cedar or juniper tree, especially Juniperus deppeana.
(anatomy) ear, outer ear, shijaa ― my ear, bijaa ―
The antelope or, more specifically, the pronghorn, Antilocapra americana.

corn stalk, mescal stalk
bikaz ― its stalk
bead, beads, shiyo’ ― my beads, biyo’ ― her/his/their
be gray, be brown; be any dull color
